quotes.quote: Weather Sign – Severe Weather Warning – Hope is a futile wish without action.
When the breath is mastered thinking begins.
The gift of an incredible imagination.
Your emotions are influenced by your environment.
To understand your nature - align with nature.
Only your mind itself can allow you to reach a deeper understanding of its own purpose.
Only your mind itself can allow you to reach a deeper understanding of its own purpose.
Your work is your creation and contribution.
It's time to Rise and Thrive.
Keep it simple don't complicate it.
It's time to make NOW matter.
Don't die before you have lived, don't live before you have died.
Don't die before you have lived, don't live before you have died.
Focus on you, and the universe will take care of itself.
Understand nature, and you have the answer to life.
